A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. Hear<S>8085</S> my prayer<S>8605</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, give ear<S>238</S> to my supplications<S>8469</S>: in thy faithfulness<S>530</S> answer<S>6030</S> me, and in thy righteousness<S>6666</S>.
And enter<S>935</S> not into judgment<S>4941</S> with thy servant<S>5650</S>: for in thy sight<S>6440</S> shall no man living<S>2416</S> be justified<S>6663</S>.
For the enemy<S>341</S> hath persecuted<S>7291</S> my soul<S>5315</S>; he hath smitten<S>1792</S> my life<S>2416</S> down<S>1792</S> to the ground<S>776</S>; he hath made me to dwell<S>3427</S> in darkness<S>4285</S>, as those that have been long<S>5769</S> dead<S>4191</S>.
Therefore is my spirit<S>7307</S> overwhelmed<S>5848</S> within me; my heart<S>3820</S> within<S>8432</S> me is desolate<S>8074</S>.
I remember<S>2142</S> the days<S>3117</S> of old<S>6924</S>; I meditate<S>1897</S> on all thy works<S>6467</S>; I muse<S>7878</S> on the work<S>4639</S> of thy hands<S>3027</S>.
I stretch forth<S>6566</S> my hands<S>3027</S> unto thee: my soul<S>5315</S> thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty<S>5889</S> land<S>776</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
Hear<S>6030</S> me speedily<S>4118</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>: my spirit<S>7307</S> faileth<S>3615</S>: hide<S>5641</S> not thy face<S>6440</S> from me, lest I be like<S>4911</S> unto them that go down<S>3381</S> into the pit<S>953</S>. <sup>lest: or, for I am become like, etc</sup>
Cause me to hear<S>8085</S> thy lovingkindness<S>2617</S> in the morning<S>1242</S>; for in thee do I trust<S>982</S>: cause me to know<S>3045</S> the way<S>1870</S> wherein<S>2098</S> I should walk<S>3212</S>; for I lift up<S>5375</S> my soul<S>5315</S> unto thee.
Deliver<S>5337</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, from mine enemies<S>341</S>: I flee unto thee to hide<S>3680</S> me. <sup>flee: Heb. hide me with thee</sup>
Teach<S>3925</S> me to do<S>6213</S> thy will<S>7522</S>; for thou art my God<S>430</S>: thy spirit<S>7307</S> is good<S>2896</S>; lead<S>5148</S> me into the land<S>776</S> of uprightness<S>4334</S>.
Quicken<S>2421</S> me, O LORD<S>3068</S>, for thy name's<S>8034</S> sake: for thy righteousness'<S>6666</S> sake bring<S>3318</S> my soul<S>5315</S> out of trouble<S>6869</S>.
And of thy mercy<S>2617</S> cut off<S>6789</S> mine enemies<S>341</S>, and destroy<S>6</S> all them that afflict<S>6887</S> my soul<S>5315</S>: for I am thy servant<S>5650</S>.
